item.title: [PI]Giving donator through clickingbuttons>HELP
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:4, topic:477681”][quote author=iBunnie link=topic=595879.msg4195645#msg4195645 date=1357450501]

How do you know it doesn’t grant the donator rank? What are you expecting to happen, versus what actually happens?

I’m exactly expecting it to give the player the donator rank, which includes a crown O_O and nothing happens, you don’t even dc…you just get the message and it deletes the item.
[/quote]

Does logging out and logging back in fix the problem?[/quote]
I thought that would have been it, but no.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Giving donator through clickingbuttons>HELP
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

I made a book, that sends dialogues asking if they’d like to use the book and become a donator or continue as a free player. This is what i put in clickingbuttons on the correct button line, which is 9157:

} else if (c.dialogueAction == 744) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(784, 1);
c.isDonator = 1;
c.sendMessage("Grats you're donor blah blahlbha");

the thing is, when you select the option ingame, it shows the message, and deletes the item…BUT it does not give the donator status? Why would this be?

Read full topic
